## SavedObjectsRawDocParseOptions.flexible property

Optional flag to allow for flexible handling of the raw document ID and namespace field. This is needed when a previously single-namespace object type is converted to a multi-namespace object type, and it is only intended to be used during upgrade migrations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
flexible?: boolean;
```
